full_summary:
# Forensic Services Tender Announcement
## Government of Canada Contract
### Notice No: SRV-GD-2023-0001 

#### Overview

Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is seeking proposals for the provision of forensic services to support the organization's security incident response efforts. This Request for Proposal (RFP) aims to establish multiple partnerships with service providers capable of conducting forensic investigations.

#### Description of Works

FCC is seeking a forensic services provider to support the organization in conducting investigations into security incidents, such as malware infections, external attacks, and fraud. The successful provider is expected to have certified resources with expertise in forensic analysis, and to be able to adapt to FCC's evolving IT environment and business requirements.

#### Contract Details

* Contract Value: Up to $5 million over a 5-year period
* Contract Terms: Multiple, non-mandatory contract terms with options for extension
* Delivery Location: Regina, Saskatchewan, Canada

#### Contact Information

Prospective Proponents should contact:

* Ronke Niagwan, Procurement Manager, Farm Credit Canada, at procurement@fcc-fac.ca or 000-000-0000.

#### Tender Requirements

This RFP is open to all qualified providers. All submissions must be completed electronically through MERX and be received by August 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM CST.

#### Notice of Cancelation

The Government of Canada reserves the right to cancel this Request for Proposal at any time, with or without cause.

#### Languages

This Notice is available in both official languages: English and French. Unless otherwise specified, all documentation and information will be provided in both languages.

Note: The RFP documents are available on MERX. Bidders must pay relevant fees for downloading documents.

[The Merx logo is present in the original text].
